snippet: A British online service that matches elderly and disabled patients with home carers is expanding nationwide by adding another 25,000 care professionals to its database, founder Jamie Wilson said on Monday....

headline.main: UK Online Carer-Patient Matchmaker HomeTouch Expands Nationwide
headline.print_headline: UK Online Carer-Patient Matchmaker HomeTouch Expands Nationwide

lead_paragraph: A British online service that matches elderly and disabled patients with home carers is expanding nationwide by adding another 25,000 care professionals to its database, founder Jamie Wilson said on Monday.
